{{Wired embedded system |brand=SolidRun |model=MACCHIATObin |revision=DoubleShot (Rev 1.3) |manuf_country=Israel |is_manuf=No |availability=Currently Shipping |price=498 |est_release_date=04/2017 |type=development board, single-board computer |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.5 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F8040 |cpu1_cspeed=2.0 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=8 GiB |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=KLM8G1GETF-B041 |fla2=4 |fla2_brand=Winbond |fla2_model=W25Q32BVZPIG |ram1=16 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=DDR4 DIMM |expansion_if_types=PCIe (x4), USB 2.0, USB 3.0, SATA 3.0, SFP+ |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=3 |expansion_sata_num=3 |expansion_sfp_num=3 |jtag=yes,, 20-pin header,, populated,, CON5 |serial=yes,, console port,, USB Female Micro-B,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1512 |eth_chip3_brand=Marvell |eth_chip3_model=88X3310 (x2) |lan_speed=10GbE |lan_ports=2 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=USB to Basic UART IC;FTDI;FT230X;;1;,,, USB VBUS Controller;On Semi;NCP380;;1;,,, 1MB SPI Serial Flash;Micron;MP25P80;;2;,,, 8-Channel I2C-bus Switch w/Reset;NXP;PCA9548A;;1;,,, 30A, 1.5-15V Synchronous Step-Down Converter;TI;TPS53355;;1;,,, 6A, 2MHz Synchronous Step-Down Converter,Richtek;RT8073;;4;,,, 16A Int. Synchronous Buck Regulator;International Rectifier;IR3895;;1;,,, 6A, 23V, 500kHz Synchro Buck Converter w/ LDO 3.3V;Richtek;RT7290;;1;,,, 6A, 23V, 500kHz Synchro Buck Converter w/ LDO 5V;Richtek;RT7291;;1;,,, 1A Low-Dropout Adjustable Regulator w/ Enable;Diodes Inc;AP7361C;;1;,,, 1A Low-Dropout Positive Voltage Regulator;On Semi;NCP1117;;2;,,, 3A Sink/Source DDR Termination Regulator;On Semi;NCP51200;;1;,,, 1.65-5.5V Dual Buffer with Open Drain Outputs;On Semi;NL27WZ07;;1;,,, 2-Input AND Gate/CMOS Logic Level Shifter;On Semi;MC74VHC1GT08;;2;,,, 150mA Low-Dropout Regulator;Microchip;MIC5317;;1; |flags=Micro SD Card slot, RTC w/ battery, SFP+, UART, SPI, I2C, heatsink, fan |stock_boot=U-Boot;2017.03-armada-17.10; |stock_os=Linux;4.4.52;Ubuntu 16.04.5; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, Debian, Armbian }} {{TagLine|Mini ITX Networking Development Board}} :[https://www.solid-run.com/arm-servers-networking-platforms/macchiatobin/#macchiatobin-double-shot Product page] {{â€¢}} [https://solidrun.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/developer/pages/286655749 Support page] *[https://www.arm.com/architecture/systems/systemready-certification-program/es Arm SystemReady ES] Certified ''Marvell MACCHIATOBin - Rev 1.3
By SolidRun Ltd. (www.solidrun.com)'' is silkscreened on the board top. {{See also|List of Single-board computers}} *[https://linuxgizmos.com/open-spec-networking-mini-itx-has-10-2-5-and-1gbps-ports/ ''Open-spec networking Mini-ITX has 1, 2.5, and 10 GbE ports'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2017/04/24/solidrun-macchiatobin-mini-itx-networking-board-is-now-available-for-349-and-up/ ''SolidRun MACCHIATOBin Mini-ITX Networking Board'' on '''CNX-Software'''] ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Marvell]]'' 88F8040 @2.0GHz :Quad-Core ARM (Cortex-A72) *Memory: 16GB DDR4 (DIMM) RAM *Storage: 4MB NOR Flash, :8GB Samsung eMMC, 3x SATA 3.0 :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card *Network: 2x 10GbE via copper or SFP, :1x 2.5GbE SFP, 1x Gigabit Ethernet ports *USB: 1x USB 3.0 port, 2x USB 2.0 headers *PCIe: 1x PCIe 3.0 (x4) slot *Power: 12V, 2.5A via barrel or ATX power supply __NOTOC__
